attributes.action: Remove Caution. Give Second Chance. for worried parents and remorsefull kids /adults
attributes.additional_details: The Government URGED please remove cautions after 1 or 2 years or introduce a scheme whereby the cautioned person is given a full in-depth course based on life changing classes . They would learn becoming better persons, benefit to the society and how to redevelop themselves. Duration of the courses would be 3, 6 months unpaid (but the cautioned person has to pay for the course) this will show their commitment to making the changes, wanting to make a difference. The course cud consist of course work, case works, voluntary work, collecting ref’s, working volun in prison etc. creating a portfolio. Also learning what lives of criminals is like. How they would now value normal life. On successful completion the caution to be removed or show as removed and their future employers or universities shud accept this. We all make mistakes and shud be given a second chance especially if we want to make changes for our future and for our country. Please help us, help our kids future
